member.name: M:ArchitecturalStandpoints.Tests.DummyServiceController.GreetAsync(System.String)
member.param: Name of the person to greet.
member.returns: Message greeting the given person's name or anonymously greeting if no name is provided.

member.name: T:ArchitecturalStandpoints.Tests.GreetResult
member.summary: Represents the result for the operation:

member.name: P:ArchitecturalStandpoints.Tests.GreetResult.ResultType
member.summary: Indicates the type of the result.

member.name: P:ArchitecturalStandpoints.Tests.GreetResult.Message
member.summary: If is then contains the returned message from the operation. null otherwise.

member.name: T:ArchitecturalStandpoints.Tests.GreetResults
member.summary: Represents the set of possible results for the operation
